customer_type.dialogue: I'm looking to sell this %s. It's worth $%d. Any objections?
You clearly have no appreciation for true value.
Look man, you think this %s, is worth at least $%d?
Yall never want to help out someone in need.
Thanks for taking it off my hands bud.
I'm not really sure what this %s is worth. would $%d work?
Oh, I see. Would $%d also work?
I may be dumb, but not that dumb.
I guess that's fair. Bye then.
I've done my own appraisal, and this %s is worth $%d.
I'll take it, pleasure doing business
